titles.title: To require the Postmaster General to redraw ZIP code boundaries to coincide with community boundaries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 5/9/1995--Introduced. Requires the Postmaster General to establish procedures to provide that boundaries delimiting any area included within any particular zip code do not cross the boundary of any community. Considers areas having the same first five zip code digits as areas having the same ZIP code.
